subject: Basketball
Sexual Harassment
Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: N.B.A. Commissioner David Stern said the league would not discipline the Knicks in the wake of a jury’s finding that Isiah Thomas, the team president, sexually harassed a former team executive.
snippet: N.B.A. Commissioner David Stern said the league would not discipline the Knicks in the wake of a jury’s finding that Isiah Thomas, the team president, sexually harassed a former team executive.
